data.name: Escape the hidden Mines!
data.description:
In this kata you have to escape a mine with multiple levels. The map of the mine is hidden and you can only see the tile in front of you.

When you enter the mine you will start at level 0 and face in a random direction. You will always start at the same position when you enter a level. There can be intersections and loops. You will never start in a loop though.

In later levels there will be items. 

You will be able to use the following Actions:

```javascript
// Look in front of you
// returns the type of tile in front of you
miner.look()
```
```javascript
// Turn left
miner.turnLeft()
```
```javascript
// Turn right
miner.turnRight()
```
```javascript
// Move to the tile in front of you
// returns the result of you movement
miner.move()
```
```javascript
// Uses the item on the tile in front of you and moves there
// returns the result of you movement
miner.use(itemName)
```

Use `console.log(miner.look())` and `console.log(miner.move())`.

After you escaped the mine some tests with random variations will make sure you did not hardcode the solution ;)
